fr.lri.swingstates.sm.jtransitions

Class EnterOnJTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.Transition
      • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.transitions.Event

              • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.jtransitions.MouseOnJTag
                • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.jtransitions.EnterOnJTag

  • public class EnterOnJTag
extends MouseOnJTag
    A transition triggered when the cursor enters in a component with a given tag.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnterOnJTag

        public EnterOnJTag(java.lang.String tagName)
        Builds a transition triggered when the cursor enters with any modifier in a tagged component. This transition loops on the current state.
        Parameters:
        tagName - The name of the tag

        public EnterOnJTag(java.lang.String tagName,
           int modifier)
        Builds a transition triggered when the cursor enters in a tagged component. This transition loops on the current state.
        Parameters:
        tagName - The name of the tag
        modifier - The modifier: NOMODIFIER, CONTROL, ALT, SHIFT, ALT_CONTROL, CONTROL_SHIFT, ALT_SHIFT or ALT_CONTROL_SHIFT
